successes.title: Slide Camera Sling and Clutch Hand Strap by Peak Design
successes.description: A camera sling strap and hand strap that are quick-connecting, quick-adjusting, comfortable, versatile and classically beautiful.

Pledges.description: If you simply want to help our cause, or you only want to pick rewards from the Add-On Menu (see FAQ), then choose this reward.
Anchor Link'd in. Get 1 set of Anchor Links to upgrade any standard camera strap into a versatile, quick-connecting wonder strap. Save $5 from the planned future retail price.
Clutch it up. Get 1 Clutch hand strap - the first of its kind. Save $10 from the planned future retail price.
Slide on over. Get 1 Slide camera strap - the most thoughtful camera strap you've ever seen. Save $10 from the planned future retail price.
Strap Duo: Slide & Clutch. These two beautifully designed straps can be used together or interchangeably. Save $20 from the planned future retail price.

Kickstarter Combo: Slide, Clutch & CapturePRO. Get our new straps, plus a new, improved version of the CapturePRO Camera Clip. Use all products together as a complete camera-carrying system, or use each separately. Save $30 from the planned future retail price.
